dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5438 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow officers and employees of the Department of the Treasury to provide to taxpayers information regarding low-income taxpayer clinics.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Holding (for himself and Mr. Lewis of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow officers and employees of the Department of the Treasury to provide to taxpayers information regarding low-income taxpayer clinics.

section.header: Provision of information regarding low-income taxpayer clinics
section.text: Section 7526(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Provision of information regarding qualified low-income taxpayer clinics
paragraph.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, officers and employees of the Department of the Treasury mayâ€”

subparagraph.text: advise taxpayers of the availability of, and eligibility requirements for receiving, advice and assistance from qualified low-income taxpayer clinics receiving funding under this section, and
provide information regarding the location of, and contact information for, such clinics.
